about_the_game:
Build the circus of your dreams!.

Hire the cutest animal workers and teach them circus skills!
Develop, expand your circus, hire new workers and reach the top in the world of circus business.
In this casual economic clicker you can relax and enjoy watching your workers entertain visitors performing various tricks, tricks, and performances!
Get new and unique workers, dress them up in the best costumes and move further and further to get to the mystical world of circus animals, where legendary representatives of circus professions live!
Relaxing atmosphere, pleasant sound and art design, minimum effort and maximum fun!
